articles.title: African and South Asian citizens fleeing Ukraine denounce racism - The Washington Post
articles.description: Several African, South Asian and Middle Eastern citizens in Ukraine have denounced instances of racism while trying to flee the shelling in the country.

articles.title: Saturday's weather: Heavy rainfall expected across the country - News24
articles.description: The South African Weather Service has issued a yellow level 2 warning for disruptive rainfall over the central and western parts of Free State, western parts of the North West, and north-eastern parts of the Northern Cape.

articles.title: Brad Binder beats Nakagami by half a tenth - motogp.com
articles.description: KTM’s South African takes top billing in the opening MotoGP™ session of the season; Bagnaia crashes
articles.content: Red Bull KTM Factory Racing star Brad Binder pipped Takaaki Nakagami (LCR Honda Idemitsu) to the first MotoGP P1 of 2022 at the Grand Prix of Qatar. The South Africans 1:54.851 was 0.056s better than… [+2115 chars]

articles.title: DRIVEN: BMW M240i xDrive Coupé - Carmag South Africa
